alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:03PM MST until January 29 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin and South Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will occur in areas around Farson, along US Highway 191 and Highway 28. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin
